panels.description: Average time required to delivered from Open to Released
panels.title: Average Cycle Time (Open -> Released)

panels.description: Average time required to delivered from In Progress to Published
panels.title: Average Cycle Time (In Progress -> Released)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT *,
       (SELECT release_date FROM metricsDB.releases s2
        WHERE s2.release_date < s.release_date
        ORDER BY s2.release_date DESC LIMIT 1) as previous_release
FROM metricsDB.releases s WHERE s.release_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY s.release_date
targets.uql:
parse-json
| jsonata "$map($, function($v, $i, $a) {$i=0 ? $merge([{'Previous Version': 'None'}, $v]) : $merge([{'Previous Version': $a[$i-1].release_date}, $v])})"
| order by "name" asc

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM metricsDB.status_changes ORDER BY version

panels.title: Mean time by status per version

panels.description: Average time required to deliver from Open to Published. ()
panels.title: Lead Time (Open -> Released)

panels.description: Average time required to deliver from In Progress to Released
panels.title: Lead Time (In Progress -> Released)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT *,
       (SELECT release_date FROM metricsDB.releases s2
        WHERE s2.release_date < s.release_date
        ORDER BY s2.release_date DESC LIMIT 1) as previous_release
FROM metricsDB.releases s WHERE name = '${version:text}' ORDER BY s.release_date

list.definition: SELECT CONCAT(name, "###", DATE_FORMAT(release_date, '%Y-%m-%d')) as release_date FROM metricsDB.releases WHERE name NOT LIKE '%,%' AND name NOT LIKE '%''%'
list.label: Version
list.name: version
list.query: SELECT CONCAT(name, "###", DATE_FORMAT(release_date, '%Y-%m-%d')) as release_date FROM metricsDB.releases WHERE name NOT LIKE '%,%' AND name NOT LIKE '%''%'
